JavaScript Quickstart [Documentation](https://developer.dromo.io/welcome) [API Reference](https://developer.dromo.io/api-reference/authentication) [Documentation](https://developer.dromo.io/welcome) [API Reference](https://developer.dromo.io/api-reference/authentication) ## [â€‹](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript\#step-by-step-guide) 1 [Navigate to header](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript#) Installation #### [â€‹](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript\#using-cdn) Copy Ask AI ``` ``` #### [â€‹](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript\#using-npm-package) Terminal Copy Ask AI ``` npm install dromo-uploader-js ``` JavaScript Copy Ask AI ``` import DromoUploader from "dromo-uploader-js"; ``` 2 [Navigate to header](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript#) Initialize the Uploader JavaScript Copy Ask AI ``` const licenseKey = "YOUR_FRONTEND_LICENSE_KEY"; // Get this from the Dromo dashboard const fields = [\ { label: "Name", key: "name" },\ { label: "Email", key: "email_address" }\ // Define other fields as needed\ ]; const settings = { importIdentifier: "MyContactsImport", // A descriptive name for this import type developmentMode: true // Set to false in production }; const user = { id: "unique_user_id_123", name: "Jane Doe", email: "jane@example.com" // Add other user metadata as needed }; const dromo = new DromoUploader(licenseKey, fields, settings, user); ``` 3 [Navigate to header](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript#) Register Callbacks (Optional) JavaScript Copy Ask AI ``` dromo.onResults((data, metadata) => { console.log("Imported Data:", data); console.log("Import Metadata:", metadata); // Process the data here return "Import successful! Thanks!"; // Optional message to show to the user }); // For other available callbacks like row hooks, column hooks, etc., // refer to the [DromoUploader SDK Reference](/reference/dromo-uploader-sdk) and [Hooks documentation](/hooks). ``` 4 [Navigate to header](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript#) Open the Uploader JavaScript Copy Ask AI ``` dromo.open(); ``` ## [â€‹](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript\#basic-example) Copy Ask AI ```
``` - [Step By Step Guide](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript#step-by-step-guide) - [Using CDN](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript#using-cdn) - [Using NPM package](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript#using-npm-package) - [Basic Example](https://developer.dromo.io/getting-started/javascript#basic-example) Responses are generated using AI and may contain mistakes.

## [â€‹](https://developer.dromo.io/guides/using-manyToOne\#field-configuration)

JavaScript

React

Copy

Ask AI

```
export const fields = [\
  {\
    label: 'Email',\
    key: 'email',\
    type: 'email'\
  },\
  {\
    label: 'Primary Earnings',\
    key: 'primary_earnings',\
    type: ['number', 'usd'],\
  },\
  {\
    label: 'Additional Earnings',\
    key: 'additional_earnings',\
    type: ['number', 'usd'],\
    manyToOne: true,\
  },\
];

```

Ask AI

```
[\
  {\
    "email": "tumvu@comowa.fk",\
    "primary_earnings": 8954.08,\
    "additional_earnings": [\
      66.66,\
      88.88\
    ]\
  },\
  {\
    "email": "hovawu@goiv.io",\
    "primary_earnings": 446.02,\
    "additional_earnings": [\
      6478.45,\
      7435.89\
    ]\
  },\
  {\
    "email": "idmup@te.au",\
    "primary_earnings": 2175.84,\

### [â€‹](https://developer.dromo.io/guides/using-manyToOne\#result-metadata)

Copy

Ask AI

```
{
  "id": null,
  "filename": "earnings.csv",
  "importIdentifier": "earnings",
  "user": {
    "id": "testUser"
  },
  "rowsWithError": [],
  "rawHeaders": [\
    "email",\
    "salary",\
    "gifts",\
    "bonuses"\
  ],
  "fields": {
    "email": {
      "fileHeaderIndex": 0,
      "fileHeader": "email",
      "isCustom": false,
      "manyToOne": false
    },
    "primary_earnings": {
      "fileHeaderIndex": 1,
      "fileHeader": "salary",
      "isCustom": false,
      "manyToOne": false
    },
    "additional_earnings": {
      "fileHeader": null,
      "fileHeaders": [\
        "gifts",\
        "bonuses"\
      ],
      "fileHeaderIndex": null,
      "fileHeaderIndexes": [\
        2,\
        3\
      ],
      "isCustom": false,
      "manyToOne": true
    }
  },
  "errors": []
}

```

## [â€‹](https://developer.dromo.io/guides/using-manyToOne\#hooks)

### [â€‹](https://developer.dromo.io/guides/using-manyToOne\#row-hook)

JavaScript

React

Copy

Ask AI

```
dromo.registerRowHook(function (record) {
  if (record.index !== 2) return record;
  record.row.additional_earnings.manyToOne![0].value = 42.0;
  record.row.additional_earnings.manyToOne![1].info = [\
    { level: "error", message: "Invalid additional earning" },\
  ];
  return record;
});

```

### [â€‹](https://developer.dromo.io/guides/using-manyToOne\#column-hooks)

JavaScript

React

Copy

Ask AI

```
dromo.registerColumnHook("additional_earnings", (values) => {
  // Cap additional earnings at $5,000
  return values.map((v) => {
    if (v.value > 5000) {
      return {
        ...v,
        value: 5000,
        info: [{ level: "info", message: "capped at $5000" }],
      };
    } else return v;
  });
});

```

### [â€‹](https://developer.dromo.io/guides/using-manyToOne\#step-hooks)

Copy

Ask AI

```
{
  "fields": {
    "email": {
      "fileHeaderIndex": 0,
      "fileHeader": "email",
      "isCustom": false,
      "manyToOne": false
    },
    "primary_earnings": {
      "fileHeaderIndex": 1,
      "fileHeader": "salary",
      "isCustom": false,
      "manyToOne": false
    },
    "additional_earnings": {
      "fileHeader": null,
      "fileHeaders": [\
        "gifts",\
        "bonuses"\
      ],
      "fileHeaderIndex": null,
      "fileHeaderIndexes": [\
        2,\
        3\
      ],
      "isCustom": false,
      "manyToOne": true
    }
  },
  "rawHeaders": [\
    "email",\
    "salary",\
    "gifts",\
    "bonuses"\
  ],
  "headerMapping": {
    "email": "email",
    "salary": "primary_earnings",
    "gifts": "additional_earnings",
    "bonuses": "additional_earnings"
  }
}

```

JavaScript

React

Copy

Ask AI

```
...
dromo.registerStepHook("REVIEW_STEP", (_uploader, data) => {
  console.log("manyToOne file headers", data.fields.additional_earnings.fileHeaders);
  // ["gifts", "bonuses"]
  console.log("manyToOne file indexes", data.fields.additional_earnings.fileHeaderIndexes);
  // [2, 3]
});
...

```

- [Field Configuration](https://developer.dromo.io/guides/using-manyToOne#field-configuration)
